title: My league client is a black screen
body: so i went to play a game and its black. like the screen is black just for the client. im still in the game so if possible can someone help me fix this fast

replies.body:
well i can remember. sorry its been a while since i logged into league from chrome. it started right when it was loading the game after champ select. nothing was visible
.

Sorry to hear the game's already ended, but I may be able to figure out what caused the screen to pop up and prevent more cases. For starters can you tell me when the black screen popped up; had the game been going on for a couple minutes or did it come up when you went into Loading screen? Were there any error message pop ups as well like 'LoL is not responding' or a bugsplat notification?

The more details you give me the better I can try to zero in on a cause. I'd also suggest staying clear of queuing up for matchmaking until we find the cause. Don't want more games where a black screen interrupts you! ;_;
and the game is done. whelp.
